contents.text: Thank you for calling Square, based in San Francisco, where we work for every business.
For information about our payment solutions and POS hardware, press 1.
To speak with a Point of Sale hardware specialist, press 1.
Thank you. Your call is important to us. Please hold while we connect you to a POS hardware specialist.

navigationGoals: Order replacement POS hardware and confirm it integrates with my current setup
I need help setting up my new Square POS terminal for my veteran-owned coffee truck.
Update firmware on my Square Terminal and calibrate the contactless and magstripe modules
I’d like to buy a new Square countertop terminal and learn about its features.
I need help configuring my Square terminal for ticket sales at our physics lab event.

contents.text: To explore our online payment and e-commerce tools, press 2.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you with our online payments team.

navigationGoals: Set up Square’s online payment tools on my e-commerce website
I want to integrate Square’s online payment tools into my small veteran-run web store.
Integrate Square's payment API into my e-commerce site and configure OAuth tokenization
I need help integrating Square’s online checkout on my website.
I'd like to set up an online payment page to sell physics club merchandise.

contents.text: For customer support and billing inquiries, press 2.
For technical support with your Square devices, press 1.
Thank you. One of our technical support agents will be with you shortly. Please hold.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot my Square device’s connectivity so I can process payments
My Square card reader keeps losing connection at my event and I need technical support.
Diagnose Bluetooth connectivity and driver errors on my Square Reader
My Square card reader won’t turn on—can someone help me fix it?
My Square card reader isn't connecting; I need technical assistance to fix it before our lab demonstration.

contents.text: For account management and billing questions, press 2.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you to the billing and account management department.

navigationGoals: Obtain last month’s billing statement and update my payment information
I need to review my monthly Square fees and update my billing information for my nonprofit.
Review detailed billing statements and adjust my subscription plan
I want to update my billing info and understand my latest invoice.
I need to review and update my billing statement and payment method for my Square account.
